s: ^Aw, hey! My day just got better because I ran into you!

Chat1: ^Lila?Smiling "Well you always know where to find me; five days a week. Four seasons a year!"
^Lila?Smiling "Did you hear that Mrs. Lee is going to be helping with my class?"

s: ^That's great news for both of you!
^That's awesome. I ran into Mrs. Lee earlier; I know you're friends.

Chat2: ^Lila?Smiling "I am excited to work with her. I'm glad she asked about volunteer opportunities!"

s: ^That is very sweet. You are close with Eddie, right?
^Nice! Speaking of Mrs. Lee... I could use your help.

Chat3: ^Lila?Smiling "Yeah! We were neighbors growing up. We did the whole "walking to school together" thing as kids."

s: ^Awww. Would be okay, then,  if I asked you to help Mrs. Lee?
^Can I ask you for advice regarding Eddie and Mrs Lee?

Explain1: ^Lila?Smiling "Ohh yes! I haven't seen her yet this morning, I've been so busy running around. I usually see her before her aerobics class."
^Lila?Smiling "It's so good to see her involved in so many things here at the Community Center. Yesterday she asked me how I felt about native plants in the front garden bed!"

s: ^She's nervous about visiting the pharmacy, and I'm trying to help.

Explain2: ^Lila?Neutral "Oh! Eddie mentioned that she offered to pick up a prescription for him. Is this related?"
^Lila?Neutral "He mentioned that he has an appointment next month with a new doctor closer to school, but he needs one more refill."

s: ^It is! She's nervous about getting it right.

Suggestion1: ^Lila_Day 1_Mrs. Lee could ask Lila to pick up the prescription for her_Mrslee1-1

Suggestion1.#: notification Lila_Day 1_Mrs. Lee could ask Lila to pick up the prescription for her_Mrslee1-1

Suggestion1: ^Lila?Neutral "I feel her pain; the first time I picked up a prescription for Trisha, I must have double checked it 20 times."
^Lila?Neutral "It's hard when doctors use a brand-name for a drug and the pharmacy fills with a generic. How is anyone supposed to just KNOW that?"
^Lila?Smiling "Tell you what - I need to pick up a prescription for Trisha tonight; can I pick up Eddie's prescription up for Mrs. Lee?
^Lila?Smiling "Have her stop by and give me the information, if that would help. "

s: ^I'm doubt she would be comfortable with that... maybe a pep talk instead?
^That would help her feel better about today, but what about next time?

Suggestion2: ^Lila_Day 1_Mrs. Lee could ask Lila to come to the pharmacy with her so she has support asking clarifying questions_Mrslee1-2

Suggestion2.#: notification Lila_Day 1_Mrs. Lee could ask Lila to come to the pharmacy with her so she has support asking clarifying questions_Mrslee1-2

Suggestion2: ^Lila?Smiling "Maybe she needs some in-person support; in that case, I'm happy to go with her. She can do this, but I can be her back-up!"

s: ^I think having you with her would make Mrs. Lee feel more confident.

Goodbye: ^Lila?Smiling "Sounds good. I can take a break from here whenever!"

s: ^You're a great friend, Lila. Thank you.
